II fldgi – wêlrK

iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha oekaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï ... 452
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
451-B 081431 — 353 (2018/07)
D 1 -
   msgqj 
jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| oekaùï ... ... ... —
msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ... —
msial,a úlsKSu ... ... ...  469
nQo,a kvq ms<sn| oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
kS;s wOHdmk iNdfõ oekaùï ... ... ... —
fkd;dßia ,ehsia;= ... ... ... ... —
úúO oekaùï ... ... ... ... 473
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h 
  fuu .eiÜ m;%h www. documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka nd.; l< yel' 
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk oekaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs 
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr ^tkï" 2018 wf.daia;= ui 10 jeks Èk m<lrk 
.eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2018 cQ,s ui 26 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m<l< hq;= njg 
hï mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh 
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜

2018 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk"
fld<U 08"
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ § h'
ie' hq'-  2018'07'13 Èk m< jQ wxl 2"080 ork .eiÜ m;%fha  IV ^w& fldgi m< fkdùh'
ie' hq' -  (i)   úisjk wdKavql%u jHjia:d ixfYdaOkh mk;a flgqïm; 2018 cQ,s ui 06 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ck-
rcfha .eiÜ m;%fha II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m< lrk ,§'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2018'07'20

Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
W;=re ueo m<d;ano uydêlrKh - fmdf<dkakrej
ld,h bl=;a ù we;s kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha mjrk ,ÿj wjika lr jir 05 lg jvd mer‚ my; Wmf,aLkfha wxl i|yka kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu 
i|yd f,aLk .; lr 2018'10'13 jeks Èfkka miqj fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq`Miaid úkdY lsÍug lghq;= iqodkï lr we;'
   02' fuu kvq iïnkaOfhka hï md¾Yjlrejl=g kvq jd¾;djl ,shú,a,la fyda msgm;la ,nd .ekSug wjYH fõ kï" 
2018'10'13 jeks Èkg fmr meñK fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾jßhf.ka ,nd .kakd f,ig fuhska okajd isáñ'

uf.a wxlh ( fud'È'ufya'wê'f,a'yd 2018'

fuu wêlrKfha we;s oekg jir mylg fmr wjika ù we;s my; Wmf,aLkfha oelafjk kvq jd¾;d 2018 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 
26 Èfkka miqj fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iqodkï lr we;'
   02' tfyhska fuys my; Wmf,aLkfha oelafjk kvq iïnkaOfhka hï md¾Yjlrejl= ;udg wjYH kvqfõ iïmQ¾K 
úia;rhla fyda tys hï fldgila ,nd.ekSug wjYH fõkï" tA i|yd ,sÅ; b,a,Sula 2018 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 26 jeks Èkg fmr 
fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾ fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;= fõ'
   03' tfia b,a,Sï bÈßm;a fkdjqjkfyd;a my; Wmf,aLkfha ioyka kvq jd¾;d 2018 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 26 jeks Èfkka

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2018'07'20
469
msial,a úlsŒï
msial,a fjkafoaisfha úlsŒuhs
je,a,jdh Èid wêlrKfha § h
fld<U 02" Y%Su;a Ñ;a;ïm,ï tA .dâk¾ udj;" wxl 75" 
uyck nexl=j" 
'''''''''''''''''''''''''''''meñ‚,slre'
tÈßj 
 1' úfÊfldaka uqÈhkafia,df.a ioaOd;siai nKavdr 
úfÊfldaka
 2' l=remkd .uf.a ohdj;s fkdfyd;a l=remkd .uf.a 
ohdj;s úfÊfldaka
 
           fofokdu
        wxl 106" we;s,sjej
''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''ú;a;slrejka'
je,a,jdh Èid$ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha j¾I 2017'07'24 Èk m%ldYhg m;a lrk ,o iu: ;Skaÿj m%ldrj by; kï 
i|yka ú;a;slrejka úiska meñ‚,sldr nexl=jg 2017'07'24 Èk jk úg f.ùug we;s iïmQ¾K uqo, remsh,a oykj,laI 
wkQy;aoyia wgish yeg y;rhs Y; y;,sia my ^re'1"997"864'45& la njg ms<s.kS' tu uqo,ska remsh,a oykj,laI ye;a;E 
oyila ^re'1"970"000'00& muKla whlsÍug;a tlS uqo, 2017 wf.daia;= ui wju udisl jdßlh remsh,a fo,laI mkia oyi 
^re'250"000'00& la yd 2017 iema;eïn¾ ui wju udisl jdßlh remsh,a fo,laI mkiaoyi ^re'250"000'00& ne.ska jdßl 02 la 
yd 2017 fkdjeïn¾ ui isg udislj remsh,a úis tlaoyi ^re'21"000'00& ne.ska jdßl 70 la f,i f.ùug ú;a;slrejka tlÕ 
ù we;;a" tu uqo,a f.ùu ú;a;slrejka úiska meyer yer we;s neúka tlS uqo, whlr .ekSu i|yd fuu wêlrKh u.ska 
ksl=;a lr we;s weialSis wd×dj m%ldrj ;ykug f.k we;s fuys my; Wmf,aLkfha iúia;rj olajd we;s ksYap, foamf,ys 
tu ú;a;slrejkag wh;a ish¨u ysñlï yd whs;sjdislï" j¾I 2018 la jQ wf.daia;= ui 16 Èk miajre 2'00 g foam, msysá 
ia:dkfha§ m%isoaO fjkafoaisfha úl=Kkq ,nk nj ish,a,kagu fuhska ±kqï fokq ,efí'
Wmf,aLkh
W!j m<df;a" fudKrd., Èia;%slalfha" je,a,jdh m%dfoaYSh wdodhï ks,OdÍ fldÜGdifha " je,a,jdh fldar,fha" fjfyrhdh 
.u .%du ks,Odß fldÜGdifha" we;s,sjej kue;s .fï msysgd we;s i¾fõ fckrd,ajrhd úiska idokq ,en" Tyq Ndrfha we;s 
wxl 44 ork lafIa;% m;%fhys wxl fgdafmdmS' mS' 70 ork msUqfrys wxl 2009 ork ìï lene,a, jYfhka ksrEmkh lr we;s 
m%udKfhka fylaghd¾ ìxÿjhs oYu y;rhs y;hs yh ^fyla' 0'476& la we;hs .Kka n,d ;sfnk zzwe;s,sjej hdhZZ hkqfjka 
y÷kajkq ,nk my; i|yka mßÈ udhsï jQ rcfha bvï lÜáh" W;=rg ( wxl 2008 ork ìï lene,a, o" kef.kysrg ( wxl 
2010 ork ìï ;ene,a, o" ol=Kg ( wxl 2011 ork ìï lene,a, o" niakdysrg ( wxl 2007 ork ìï lene,a, hk i;r 
udhsï ;=< msysá f.dvke.s,s .yfld< m,;=re iu. uq¿ ìu o fõ' by; bvu fudKrd., Èia;%sla bvï ,shdmÈxÑ lsÍfï 
ld¾hd,fha LDO/M11$2 ork m;abrefõ ,shdmÈxÑ ù we;'

j¾I 2018 la jQ cqks ui 22 jeks Èk § h'

kvq wxlh ( tï' î'-47

^w& rg ;=< yd úfoaYhkays Ôj;ajk úúO ckjd¾.sl m%cdjka w;r jd¾.sl ixys¢hdjla we;s lsÍu i|yd lghq;= lsÍu

jeäÈhqKq lsßu¦
 
^we& iajdNdúl úm;a iy isú,a .egqï we;s jQ úg wj;ekajQjka i|yd iyk yd mqkre;a:dmk lghq;= y÷kd.ekSu" wdOdr

07-687
